SEARCH
Package org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.service

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
UserService is an interface that defines the contract for user-related operations, including signing in, refreshing tokens, fetching user details, adding a new user, and logging out.
Author:
Vladislav Baryshev

  • Method Details

    • singIn

      JwtAuthenticationDto singIn(UserCredentialsDto userCredentialsDto) throws AuthenticationException
      Signs in a user with the provided credentials and generates JWT authentication tokens.
      Parameters:
      userCredentialsDto - the user credentials used for authentication.
      Returns:
      a JwtAuthenticationDto containing the authentication token and refresh token.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - if authentication fails.

    • refreshToken

      JwtAuthenticationDto refreshToken(RefreshTokenDto refreshTokenDto) throws Exception
      Refreshes the authentication token using a valid refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshTokenDto - the refresh token used to generate a new authentication token.
      Returns:
      a JwtAuthenticationDto containing the new authentication token and the same refresh token.
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the refresh process.

    • getUserById

      UserDto getUserById(Long id) throws org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException
      Retrieves user details by the user's ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user.
      Returns:
      a UserDto containing the user's information.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException - if the user with the given ID is not found.

    • getUserByEmail

      UserDto getUserByEmail(String email) throws org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException
      Retrieves user details by the user's email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email of the user.
      Returns:
      a UserDto containing the user's information.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.crossstore.ChangeSetPersister.NotFoundException - if the user with the given email is not found.

    • addUser

      String addUser(UserDto user)
      Adds a new user to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - the user data to be added.
      Returns:
      a confirmation message or some identifier for the newly added user.

    • logout

      void logout(RefreshTokenDto refreshTokenDto)
      Logs out a user by invalidating their refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshTokenDto - the refresh token to be invalidated.
